name: HTMLDialogElement
description: The HTMLDialogElement interface provides methods to manipulate dialog elements. It inherits properties and methods from the HTMLElement interface.

refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLDialogElement' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
